00019  *  for the file's "File Type" select: "sourcecode.cpp.objcpp".

00057 static NSString *kOOChildren = @".children", *kOONodeText = @".nodeText", *kOOTagName = @"@tagName", *kOOTagPrefix = @"@tagPrefix";

00062 enum OOXMLParserOpts {
00063     OOXMLDefaultParser = 0x0,
00064     OOXMLPreserveWhitespace = 0x1,
00065     OOXMLPreserveCData = 0x2,
00066     OOXMLStripNamespaces = 0x4,
00067     OOXMLStripUpperCase = 0x8,
00068 
00069     OOXMLRecursive = 0x10,
00070     OOXMLRecursiveAtAnyLevel = 0x20,
00071     // not implemented...
00072     OOXMLNamespaceSelect = 0x40,
00073     OOXMLNamespaceSelectAtAnyLevel = 0x80
00074 };
00075 
00076 enum OOXMLWriterOpts {
00077     OOXMLPrettyPrint = 0x1,
00078     OOXMLDefaultWriter = OOXMLPrettyPrint
00079 };
00080 
00081 class OONodeSub;
00082 
00083 /**
00084  Subclass of OODictionary<OOString> to manipulate XML documents. On parsing as XML document
00085  one OONode is created for each element in the document with the attribute values stored
00086  as a NSString under a key: "@attributeName". Children of an element, be they pure text
00087  or sub elements are accumulated in an NSMutableArray under the key @".children" as well
00088  as in an array with the elements tagName (element name) as the key. This allows simple
00089  xpath expressions such as document[@"root/child"] to be evaluated by breaking up the
00090  path into the equivalent of document[@"root"][0][@"child"][0]. To gain efficient
00091  access to the text inside an element it is also stores under the key @".nodeText"
00092  in it's parent element.
00093  */
00094 
00095 class OONode : public OODictionary<OOString> {
00096 public:
00097     oo_inline OONode() {
00098         [alloc() setObject:(id)kCFNull forKey:kOOTagName];
00099     }
00100     oo_inline OONode( CFNullRef obj ) {
00101         set( (id)obj );
00102     }
00103     oo_inline OONode( id node ) {
00104         set( node );
00105     }
00106     oo_inline OONode( const OONode &node ) { 
00107         *this = node;
00108     }
00109     oo_inline OONode( NSString *tagName ) {
00110         [alloc() setObject:tagName forKey:kOOTagName];
00111     }
00112     oo_inline OONode( const OOString &tagName, const OOString &nodeText = nil ) {
00113         [alloc() setObject:tagName forKey:kOOTagName];
00114         if ( nodeText ) {
00115             [get() setObject:nodeText forKey:kOONodeText];
00116             OODictionary<OOArray<OOString> > node = get();
00117             NSMutableArray *children = node[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00118             [children addObject:nodeText];
00119         }
00120     }
00121     oo_inline OONode( NSData *xml, OOXMLParserOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultParser ) {
00122         parseXML( xml, flags );
00123     }
00124     oo_inline OONode( const OOData xml, OOXMLParserOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultParser ) {
00125         parseXML( *xml, flags );
00126     }
00127     oo_inline OONode( const OONodeArraySub &sub );
00128     oo_inline OONode( const OONodeSub &sub );
00129 
00130     oo_inline OONode &operator = ( const OONode &node ) { set( node.get() ); return *this; }
00131     oo_inline OONode &operator = ( NSData *val ) { return parseXML( val ); }
00132     oo_inline OONode &operator = ( const OONodeArraySub &sub );
00133     oo_inline OONode &operator = ( const OONodeSub &sub );
00134 
00135     OONode &parseXML( NSData *xml, OOXMLParserOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultParser );
00136     OOData writeXML( OOXMLWriterOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultWriter ) const;
00137 
00138     oo_inline OOData data() const { return writeXML(); }
00139     oo_inline operator OOData () const { return data(); }
00140 
00141     oo_inline OOString string() const { return OOString( data() ); }
00142 
00143     oo_inline OONode &operator += ( const OONode &val ) {
00144         OODictionary<OONodeArray > node = get();
00145         NSMutableArray *children = node[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00146         [children addObject:val.get()];
00147         NSString *tagName = [val objectForKey:kOOTagName];
00148         if ( tagName && tagName != (id)kCFNull ) {
00149             NSMutableArray *siblings = node[tagName].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00150             [siblings addObject:val.get()];
00151         }
00152         return *this;
00153     }
00154 
00155     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( id sub ) const;
00156     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const OOString &sub ) const;
00157     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const char *sub ) const;
00158     oo_inline OOArraySub<OONode> operator [] ( int sub ) const;
00159 
00160     oo_inline OONodeArray children() const {
00161         return [get() objectForKey:kOOChildren];
00162     }
00163     oo_inline OONode child( int which = 0 ) const {
00164         return children()[ which ];
00165     }
00166     oo_inline OOString text( int which = 0 ) const {
00167         return [get() objectForKey:kOONodeText]; // (id)child( which ).get();
00168     }
00169 
00170     oo_inline operator OOString () const { return text(); } ///
00171 };

00177 class OONodeArraySub : public OOArraySub<OOString> {
00178     friend class OONodeSub;
00179 
00180     OONodeArraySub( OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *> *ref, int sub ) : OOArraySub<OOString>( ref,  sub ) { }
00181 
00182     OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *nodeReference( BOOL refer = YES ) const {
00183         if ( refer && this->dref->aref->references )
00184             this->dref->aref->references++;
00185         return this->dref->aref;
00186     }
00187 
00188 protected:
00189     oo_inline virtual id set( id val ) const {
00190         OOArraySub<OOString>::set( val );
00191         if ( ![kOOChildren isEqualToString:dref->key] ) {
00192             NSMutableDictionary *parentNode = root ? (NSMutableDictionary *)root->get() : dref->parent( YES );
00193             OODictionary<OONodeArray> node( parentNode );
00194             OONodeArray children = node[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00195             children += OONode( val );
00196             if ( ![val objectForKey:kOOTagName] )
00197                 [val setObject:dref->key forKey:kOOTagName];
00198         }
00199         return val;
00200     }
00201 
00202 public:
00203     oo_inline OONode node() const {
00204         return nodeReference( NO )->get();
00205     }
00206     oo_inline operator OONode () const {
00207         return node();
00208     }
00209 
00210     oo_inline OOString text() const {
00211         return node().text();
00212     }
00213     oo_inline operator OOString () const {
00214         return text();
00215     }
00216 
00217     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( id sub ) const;
00218     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const OOString &sub ) const;
00219     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const char *sub ) const;
00220 };

00222 /**
00223  Internal class repesenting selection of node from XPath expression. Normally this
00224  is the OOString value of the first node selected by the xpath expression but can
00225  be cast to the first node itself or an array of all qualifying nodes.
00226  */
00227 
00228 class OONodeSub : public OODictionarySub<OOString> {
00229     friend class OONodeArraySub;
00230     friend class OONode;
00231 
00232     OOStringArray path;
00233 
00234     void supportXPath() {
00235         OOString Key = key;
00236         unichar char0 = Key[0];
00237         if ( char0 != '@' && char0 != '.' ) {
00238             path = Key / @"/";
00239             int pmax = [path count]-1, firstCharOfLast = [*path[-1] length] ? (*path[-1])[0] : 0;
00240 
00241             if ( firstCharOfLast != '@' && firstCharOfLast != '.' ) { //// && firstCharOfLast != '*' ) {
00242                 path += kOONodeText;
00243                 pmax++;
00244             }
00245 
00246             if ( pmax > 0 ) {
00247                 OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *> *exp = root ? 
00248                     new OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *>( root, *path[0] ) :
00249                     new OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *>( aref, *path[0] );
00250                 exp->references = 1;
00251 
00252                 for ( int i=1 ; i<=pmax ; i++ ) {
00253                     OOString p = *path[i];
00254                     int idx = 0;
00255                     if ( [p length] && iswdigit( p[0] ) ) {
00256                         idx = [p intValue];
00257                         i++;
00258                     }
00259 
00260                     aref = (OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *)new OONodeArraySub( exp, idx );
00261                     aref->references = 1;
00262                     if ( i == pmax )
00263                         break;
00264 
00265                     if ( (p = path[i]) == @"*" )
00266                         p = kOOChildren;
00267                     exp = new OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *>( aref, p );
00268                     exp->references = 1;
00269                 }
00270 
00271                 [this->key release];
00272                 key = [*path[pmax] retain];
00273                 root = NULL; dref = NULL;
00274             }
00275         }
00276     }
00277 
00278     oo_inline OONodeSub( const OODictionary<OOString> *ref, id sub ) : OODictionarySub<OOString>( ref, sub ) {
00279         supportXPath();
00280     }
00281     oo_inline OONodeSub( OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *ref, id sub ) : OODictionarySub<OOString>( ref, sub ) {
00282         supportXPath();
00283     }
00284     oo_inline OONodeSub( OODictionarySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *ref, id sub ) : OODictionarySub<OOString>( ref, sub ) {
00285         supportXPath();
00286     }
00287 
00288     oo_inline virtual id set( id val ) const {
00289         OODictionarySub<OOString>::set( val );
00290         if ( [kOONodeText isEqualToString:this->key] ) {
00291             OODictionary<OOArray<OOString> > node = this->parent( YES );
00292             NSMutableArray *children = node[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00293             [children addObject:val];
00294         }
00295         return val;
00296     }
00297 
00298 public:
00299     // assign and assign by mutable copy 
00300     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( OOString val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00301     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( NSString *val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00302     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( NSMutableString *val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00303     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( const char *val ) { *this = OOString( val ); return *this; }
00304     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( const OOArraySub<OOString> &val ) { set( val.get() ); return *this; }
00305     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( const OODictionarySub<OOString> &val ) { set( val.get() ); return *this; }
00306     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( double val ) {
00307         [set( [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat:@"%f", val] ) release]; 
00308         return *this;
00309     }
00310     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( int val ) {
00311         [set( [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat:@"%d", val] ) release]; 
00312         return *this;
00313     }
00314     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( const OONode &val ) {
00315         this->aref->set( val.get() ); return *this; 
00316     }
00317     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator += ( const OONode &val ) {
00318         OONode( this->parent(YES) ) += val; return *this; 
00319     }
00320 
00321     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( id sub ) const {
00322         if ( this->aref->references )
00323             this->aref->references++;
00324         return OONodeSub( this->aref, sub );
00325     }
00326     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const OOString &sub ) const {
00327         return (*this)[(id)sub];
00328     }
00329     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const char *sub ) const {
00330         return (*this)[OOString(sub)];
00331     }
00332 
00333     oo_inline OONodeArraySub operator [] ( int sub ) const {
00334         if ( this->aref->dref->references )
00335             this->aref->dref->references++;
00336         OONodeArraySub *node = new OONodeArraySub( this->aref->dref, sub );
00337         node->references = 1;
00338         OONodeSub *children = new OONodeSub( (OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *)node, kOOChildren );
00339         children->references = 1;
00340         return OONodeArraySub( (OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray*> *)children, 0 );
00341     }
00342     oo_inline BOOL operator ! () {
00343         return count() == 0;
00344     }
00345 
00346     oo_inline OONodeArray nodes() const {
00347         return this->aref ? this->aref->parent( NO ) : nil;
00348     }
00349     oo_inline operator OONodeArray () const {
00350         return nodes();
00351     }
00352 
00353     oo_inline OONode node( int which = NSNotFound ) const {
00354         return nodes()[which == NSNotFound ? aref->idx : which];
00355     }
00356     oo_inline operator OONode () const {
00357         return node();
00358     }
00359 
00360     oo_inline OOString text() const {
00361         return this->get( NO ); //[this->key characterAtIndex:0] == '@' ? OOString( this->get( NO ) ) : node().text();
00362     }
00363     oo_inline operator OOString () const {
00364         return text();
00365     }
00366 
00367     oo_inline int count() const {
00368         return [nodes() count];
00369     }
00370     //oo_inline operator int () const {
00371     //  return count();
00372     //}
00373     //oo_inline operator BOOL () {
00374     //  return count() > 0;
00375     //}
00376 
00377     oo_inline OONodeArray children() const {
00378         return [this->parent( NO ) objectForKey:kOOChildren];
00379     }
00380     inline OONode child( int which = 0 ) const {
00381         return children()[which];
00382     }
00383 
00384     inline OOStringDictionaryArray dictionaries() const {
00385         OOStringDictionaryArray out;
00386         OONodeArray in = nodes();
00387         for ( NSMutableDictionary *n in *in ) {
00388             OOStringDictionary values;
00389             OONode node = n;
00390             for( NSString *key in [*node allKeys] ) {
00391                 unichar c0 = [key characterAtIndex:0];
00392                 if ( c0 == '.' || c0 == '@' )
00393                     continue;
00394                 values[key] = node[key];
00395             }
00396             out += values;
00397         }
00398         return out;
00399     }
00400     oo_inline operator OOStringDictionaryArray () const {
00401         return dictionaries();
00402     }
00403 };

00405 inline OOArraySub<OONode> OONode::operator [] ( int sub ) const {
00406     OODictionarySub<OONode> *step1 = new OODictionarySub<OONode>( (OODictionary<OONode> *)this, kOOChildren );
00407     step1->references = 1;
00408     return (*step1)[sub];
00409 }

00466 /*=================================================================================*/
00467 /*============ Parse XML NSData into OODictionary representation ==================*/
00468 
00469 static xmlSAXHandler ooSaxHandlers;
00470 
00471 /**
00472  SAX Parses an XML document into an OODictionary based represntation. See OONode class
00473  for description of structure generated.
00474  */
00475 
00476 class OOXMLSaxParser {
00477     OODictionary<NSString *> tagCache;
00478     xmlParserCtxtPtr context;
00479 public:
00480     OOXMLParserOpts flags;
00481     OOArray<id> children;
00482     OONodeArray stack;
00483     OONode index;
00484 
00485     OOXMLSaxParser( OOXMLParserOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultParser );
00486 
00487     oo_inline NSMutableString *unique( const char *value ) {
00488         NSString *tagString = [[NSString alloc] initWithUTF8String:value],
00489                     *unique = tagCache[tagString];
00490         if ( !unique )
00491             tagCache[tagString] = unique = tagString;
00492         [tagString release];
00493         return (NSMutableString *)unique;
00494     }
00495 
00496     oo_inline const char *normalize( const char *name, char *buff ) {
00497         if ( flags & OOXMLStripNamespaces ) {
00498             const char *colon = strchr( name, ':' );
00499             if ( colon )
00500                 name = colon+1;
00501         }
00502         if ( flags & OOXMLStripUpperCase ) {
00503             char *out = buff+10, *optr = out;
00504             while ( *name )
00505                 *optr++ = tolower( *name++ );
00506             *optr = '\000';
00507             return out;
00508         }
00509         return name;
00510     }
00511 
00512     oo_inline void addNode( id node, const char *utf8String = NULL, int len = 0 ) {
00513         OONode parent = stack[-1];
00514         if ( !children )
00515             children = parent[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00516 
00517         if ( utf8String ) {
00518             static OOPattern nonWhiteSpace( @"\\S" );
00519             OOArray<OOString> textChildren = children;
00520             regmatch_t match[] = {{0, len}};
00521             OOString text = node;
00522 
00523             if ( children>0 && [*children[-1] isKindOfClass:[NSMutableString class]] )
00524                 *textChildren[-1] += node;
00525             else if ( flags & OOXMLPreserveWhitespace || nonWhiteSpace.exec( utf8String, 0, match, REG_STARTEND ) ) {
00526                 textChildren += text;
00527                 if ( ![*parent objectForKey:kOONodeText] )
00528                     [*parent setObject:node forKey:kOONodeText];
00529             }
00530         }
00531         else
00532             children += node;
00533     }
00534 
00535     oo_inline int parse( NSData *chunk ) {
00536         if ( !context ) {
00537             OONode root;
00538             if ( flags & OOXMLRecursive )
00539                 root["/"] = index = OONode();
00540             stack = OONodeArray( root, nil );
00541             context = xmlCreatePushParserCtxt( &ooSaxHandlers, this, NULL, 0, NULL);
00542             children = 0;
00543         }
00544 
00545         const char *bytes = (const char *)[chunk bytes];
00546         int length = [chunk length];
00547         while ( length > 0 && bytes[length-1] == '\000' )
00548             length--;
00549         return xmlParseChunk(context, bytes, length, 0);
00550     }
00551 
00552     oo_inline OONode rootNodeForXMLData( NSData *xml = nil ) {
00553         OOPool pool;
00554         if ( xml )
00555             parse( xml );
00556         xmlParseChunk(context, NULL, 0, 1);
00557         xmlFreeParserCtxt(context);
00558         context = NULL;
00559         return --stack;
00560     }
00561 };
00562 
00563 static void objcppStartElement(void *ctx, const xmlChar *localname, const xmlChar *prefix, const xmlChar *URI, 
00564                                int nb_namespaces, const xmlChar **namespaces, 
00565                                int nb_attributes, int nb_defaulted, const xmlChar **attributes) {
00566     char name[10000];
00567     OOXMLSaxParser &sax = *(OOXMLSaxParser *)ctx;
00568     OOString tagName = sax.unique( sax.normalize( (const char *)localname, name ) );
00569     OONode element = OONode( tagName );
00570 
00571     if ( !(sax.flags & OOXMLStripNamespaces) ) {
00572         if ( prefix )
00573             [element setObject:sax.unique( (const char *)prefix ) forKey:kOOTagPrefix];
00574 
00575         for ( int ns=0 ; ns < nb_namespaces ; ns++ ) {
00576             struct _ns { const char *prefix, *nsURI; } *nptr = 
00577             (struct _ns *)(namespaces + ns*sizeof *nptr/sizeof nptr->prefix);
00578 
00579             snprintf( name, sizeof name-1, nptr->prefix ? "@xmlns:%s" : "@xmlns%.0s", nptr->prefix );
00580             [element setObject:sax.unique( nptr->nsURI ) forKey:sax.unique( name )];
00581         }
00582     }
00583 
00584     for ( int attr_no=0 ; attr_no < nb_attributes ; attr_no++ ) {
00585         struct _attrs { const char *localName, *prefix, *uri, *value, *end; } *aptr = 
00586         (struct _attrs *)(attributes + attr_no*sizeof *aptr/sizeof aptr->localName);
00587         int vlen = aptr->end-aptr->value;
00588 
00589         OOString value( aptr->value, vlen );
00590         // attribute value fix required due to libxml2 bug...
00591         static OOReplace escapeFix = "/&#38;/&/";
00592         if ( strnstr( aptr->value, "&#38;", vlen ) != NULL )
00593             value |= escapeFix;
00594 
00595         snprintf( name, sizeof name-1, "@%s", sax.normalize( aptr->localName, name ) );
00596         [element setObject:sax.unique( value ) forKey:sax.unique( name )];
00597     }
00598 
00599     sax.stack += element;
00600     sax.children = 0;
00601 };
00602 
00603 static void objcppEndElement(void *ctx, const xmlChar *localname, const xmlChar *prefix, const xmlChar *URI) {    
00604     OOXMLSaxParser &sax = *(OOXMLSaxParser *)ctx;
00605     OONode element = sax.stack--;
00606     OONode parent = sax.stack[-1];
00607     parent += element;
00608     if ( sax.flags & OOXMLRecursiveAtAnyLevel )
00609         for ( NSDictionary *n in *sax.stack ) {
00610             OONode node = n;
00611             node["/"] += element;
00612         }
00613     else if ( sax.flags & OOXMLRecursive )
00614         sax.index += element;
00615     sax.children = 0;
00616 }
00617 
00618 static void objcppCharacters(void *ctx, const xmlChar *ch, int len) {
00619     OOXMLSaxParser &sax = *(OOXMLSaxParser *)ctx;
00620     sax.addNode( OOString( (const char *)ch, len ), (const char *)ch, len );
00621 }
00622 
00623 static void objcppCData(void *ctx, const xmlChar *value, int len) {
00624     OOXMLSaxParser &sax = *(OOXMLSaxParser *)ctx;
00625     NSData *data = [[NSData alloc] initWithBytes:value length:len];
00626     sax.addNode( data );
00627     [data release];
00628 }
00629 
00630 static void objcppSAXError(void *ctx, const char *msg, ...) {
00631     va_list argp; va_start(argp, msg);
00632     NSLogv( "OOXMLSaxParser Error - "+OOString( msg ), argp );
00633     va_end( argp );
00634 }
00635 
00636 inline OOXMLSaxParser::OOXMLSaxParser( OOXMLParserOpts flags ) {
00637     this->flags = flags;
00638 
00639     if ( !ooSaxHandlers.initialized ) {
00640         ooSaxHandlers.startElementNs = objcppStartElement;
00641         ooSaxHandlers.endElementNs = objcppEndElement;
00642         ooSaxHandlers.characters = objcppCharacters;
00643         ooSaxHandlers.initialized = XML_SAX2_MAGIC;
00644         ooSaxHandlers.error = objcppSAXError;
00645     }
00646 
00647     ooSaxHandlers.cdataBlock = this->flags & OOXMLPreserveCData ? objcppCData : NULL;
00648     context = NULL;
00649 }
00650 
00651 inline OONode &OONode::parseXML( NSData *xml, OOXMLParserOpts flags ) {
00652     return *this = OOXMLSaxParser( flags ).rootNodeForXMLData( xml );
00653 }
00654 
00655 /*=================================================================================*/
00656 /*======================== Convert Dictionary back to NSData XML ==================*/
00657 
00658 /**
00659  Class to convert OODictionary representation of XML into an NSData structure to be written to the net.
00660  */
00661 
00662 class OOXMLWriter {
00663 public:
00664     OOXMLWriterOpts flags;
00665     xmlTextWriterPtr writer;
00666     char name[1000], value[10000];
00667     int level;
00668 
00669     oo_inline void indent() {
00670         static char spaces[] = "                                                                ";
00671         checkrc( "xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString", xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString( writer, "\n%.*s", level*2, spaces ) );
00672     }
00673 
00674     oo_inline void checkrc( const char *what, int rc ) {
00675         if ( rc < 0 )
00676             OOWarn( @"Error code returned from %s(): %d", what, rc );
00677     }
00678 
00679     void traverse( OONode node ) {
00680         NSString *tagName = [*node objectForKey:kOOTagName];
00681 
00682         if ( tagName && tagName != (id)kCFNull ) {
00683             if ( flags & OOXMLPrettyPrint && level )
00684                 indent();
00685             level++;
00686 
00687             NSString *tagPrefix = [*node objectForKey:kOOTagPrefix];
00688             if ( tagPrefix ) {
00689                 [tagPrefix getCString:name maxLength:sizeof name-1 encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00690                 strcat( name, ":" );
00691             }
00692             else
00693                 name[0] = '\000';
00694 
00695             [tagName getCString:name+strlen(name) maxLength:sizeof name-1-strlen(name) encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00696             checkrc( "xmlTextWriterStartElement", xmlTextWriterStartElement( writer, (xmlChar *)name ) );
00697 
00698             for ( NSString *attr in [*node allKeys] ) {
00699                 if ( attr == kOOTagName || attr == kOOTagPrefix || [attr length] == 0 || [attr characterAtIndex:0] != '@' )
00700                     continue;
00701                 [attr getCString:name maxLength:sizeof name-1 encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00702                 [[*node objectForKey:attr] getCString:value maxLength:sizeof value-1 encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00703                 checkrc( "xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute", xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute( writer, (xmlChar *)name+1, (xmlChar *)value ) );
00704             }
00705         }
00706 
00707         BOOL hadChildElements = NO;
00708         OONodeArray children = node.children();
00709         for ( id child in *children )
00710             if ( [child isKindOfClass:[NSString class]] )
00711                 checkrc( "xmlTextWriterWriteString", xmlTextWriterWriteString( writer, (xmlChar *)[child UTF8String] ) );
00712             else if ( [child isKindOfClass:[NSData class]] )
00713                 checkrc( "xmlTextWriterWriteFormatCDATA", xmlTextWriterWriteFormatCDATA( writer, "%.*s", [child length], (char *)[child bytes] ) );
00714             else {
00715                 traverse( child );
00716                 hadChildElements = YES;
00717             }
00718 
00719         if ( tagName != (id)kCFNull ) {
00720             level--;
00721             if ( flags & OOXMLPrettyPrint && hadChildElements )
00722                 indent();
00723             checkrc( "xmlTextWriterEndElement", xmlTextWriterEndElement( writer ) );
00724         }
00725     }
00726 
00727     oo_inline OOXMLWriter( OOXMLWriterOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultWriter ) {
00728         this->flags = flags;
00729         level = 0;
00730     }
00731 
00732     oo_inline OOReference<NSData *> dataForNode( const OONode &node ) {
00733         OOPool pool;
00734         xmlBufferPtr buf = xmlBufferCreate();
00735         writer = xmlNewTextWriterMemory(buf, 0);
00736 
00737         NSString *encoding = *node[@"@encoding"];
00738         checkrc( "xmlTextWriterStartDocument", xmlTextWriterStartDocument(writer, NULL, encoding ? [encoding UTF8String] : "UTF-8", NULL) );
00739 
00740         traverse( node );
00741 
00742         xmlTextWriterEndDocument(writer);
00743         xmlFreeTextWriter(writer);
00744 
00745         OOReference<NSData *> data = [[NSData alloc] initWithBytes:buf->content length:strlen((const char *)buf->content)];
00746         xmlBufferFree(buf);
00747         [*data release];
00748         return data;
00749     }
00750 };
00751 
00752 inline OOData OONode::writeXML( OOXMLWriterOpts flags ) const {
00753     return OOXMLWriter( flags ).dataForNode( *this );
00754 }
00755 
00756 inline OONode OOURL::xml( int flags ) {
00757     return OONode( *data(), (OOXMLParserOpts)flags );
00758 }
00759 
00760 /**
00761  Simple SOAP messaging interface.
00762  */
00763 
00764 class OOSoap {
00765     OOString url, action;
00766 public:
00767     oo_inline OOSoap( OOString url, OOString action = nil ) {
00768         this->url = url;
00769         this->action = action;
00770     }
00771     oo_inline OONode send( OONode body, int flags = OOXMLDefaultParser, OOString prefix = @"SOAP-ENV" ) {
00772         OONode root;
00773         root[prefix+@":Envelope/@"+prefix+@":encodingStyle"] = @"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/";
00774         root[prefix+@":Envelope/@xmlns:"+prefix] = @"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/";
00775         root[prefix+@":Envelope/@xmlns:SOAP-ENC"] = @"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/";
00776         root[prefix+@":Envelope/@xmlns:xsi"] = @"http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema-instance";
00777         root[prefix+@":Envelope/@xmlns:xsd"] = @"http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema";
00778 
00779         root[prefix+@":Envelope/"+prefix+@":Body"] += body;
00780 
00781         OORequest req( url );
00782         [req setHTTPMethod:@"POST"];
00783         if ( !!action )
00784             req[@"SOAPAction"] = action;
00785         req[@"Content-Type"] = @"text/xml";
00786         [req setHTTPBody:root.data()];
00787         //NSLog( @"soap: %@ %@ %@", *url, *action, *root.string() );
00788         return OONode( req.data(), (OOXMLParserOpts)flags );
00789     }
00790 };
